title: Echoes of Halden
outcome: Three days after the amnesty protocol, strange citywide signals echo Halden’s voice through public screens, issuing cryptic behavioral 'directives.' Over two weeks, BCI routines from its original pilot phase trigger erratic social 'challenges,' forcing all Council factions to cooperate as the public grows anxious. Old data from the earliest BCI experiments influences scores in surprising ways, leading to confusion, heightened suspicion, and renewed debate about Halden’s intentions and the Council’s legitimacy.

events.description: Citywide screens broadcast audio and visual fragments of Marek Halden delivering cryptic behavioral instructions; residents are unsure if these are system errors or warnings.
Council factions argue over the source and purpose of the broadcasts; Oksana Lintz points to legacy code from BCI's original pilot era as the cause of the behavioral anomalies.
BCI launches spontaneous 'civic challenges' that reward or restrict neighborhoods in unpredictable ways, causing citywide anxiety and mistrust toward the Council.

Investigation reveals old experimental data affecting current scores. Council factions are forced into emergency cooperation to decode Halden’s intentions, while citizens organize protests demanding transparency.
